name: Mastermind (itch) (Blobfish Studios)
description:
A 3D version of the classic MasterMind game.

Are you able to figure out the combination before the time runs out and the board explodes?

Will you be able to get the highest score?

Can you beat your friends and the community on the global leaderboards? 

Let's find out!

  • MasterMind, as you know it
  • Play on 3 different difficulties
  • Compare yourself with others on the global leaderboards
